thing-type.label: GE 28167 (ZW3104) Plug-In Smart Dimmer
thing-type.description: Plug-In Smart Dimmer<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gtTransform any home into a smart home with the GE Z-Wave Plug-In Smart Dimmer. The Smart Dimmer enables wireless control of on/off and dim functions for standard incandescent table and floor lamps, as well as dimmable fluorescent, LED and CFL fixtures and more! Use the dimmer control to customize the lighting output and create the perfect ambiance for any room. The space-saving horizontal module plugs into a standard wall receptacle without blocking the second outlet or obstructing placement of furniture. The Dimmer provides one Z-Wave enabled outlet for the lamp you would like to control. Take control of your home lighting with GE Z-Wave Smart Lighting Controls!</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtInclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtOnce the controller is ready to add your smart dimmer, single press and release the manual/program button on the smart dimmer to add it in the network.</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtExclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtOnce the controller is ready to remove your device, press and release the manual/program button on the smart dimmer to remove it from the network</p&gt
